entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023
